sections.heading: 01|Municipal corporation may make additional regulations
sections.text: Effective:May 27, 2005Latest Legislation:House Bill 175 - 125th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDF(A) Chapters 3781. and 3791. of the Revised Code do not prevent the legislative authority of a municipal corporation from making furt

sections.heading: section3791.04of the Revised Code do not limit any of the powers of the public utilities commission, the bureau of workers' compensation, or the department of commerce, or the division of fire marshal, except as specifically provided in those sections, nor exempt any officer or department from the o
sections.text: section3791.04of the Revised Code do not limit any of the powers of the public utilities commission, the bureau of workers' compensation, or the department of commerce, or the division of fire marshal, except as specifically provided in those sections, nor exempt any officer or department from the obligation of enforcing all laws. Those sections do not limit any of the powers conferred upon municipal corporations by the constitution or the laws of this state.
